verses.verse: Now the man <S%H120><s%> had <S%H3045><s%> relations <S%H3045><s%> with his wife <S%H802><s%> Eve, <S%H2332><s%> and she conceived <S%H2029><s%> and gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> and she said, <S%H559><s%> "I have gotten <S%H7069><s%> a manchild <S%H376><s%> with [the help of] the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

And again, <S%H3254><s%> she gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to his brother <S%H251><s%> Abel. <S%H1893><s%> And Abel <S%H1893><s%> was a keeper <S%H7462><s%> of flocks, <S%H6629><s%> but Cain <S%H7014><s%> was a tiller <S%H5647><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the course <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> of time <S%H3117><s%> that Cain <S%H7014><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>

And Abel, <S%H1893><s%> on his part <S%H1571><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> of the firstlings <S%H1060><s%> of his flock <S%H6629><s%> and of their fat <S%H2459><s%> portions. <S%H2459><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had <S%H8159><s%> regard <S%H8159><s%> for Abel <S%H1893><s%> and for his offering; <S%H4503><s%>

but for Cain <S%H7014><s%> and for his offering <S%H4503><s%> He had <S%H8159><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> regard. <S%H8159><s%> So Cain <S%H7014><s%> became <S%H2734><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H2734><s%> and his countenance <S%H6440><s%> fell. <S%H5307><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> are you angry <S%H2734><s%>? And why <S%H4100><s%> has your countenance <S%H6440><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%>?

"If <S%H518><s%> you do <S%H3190><s%> well, <S%H3190><s%> will not [your countenance] be lifted <S%H7613><s%> up? And if <S%H518><s%> you do not do <S%H3190><s%> well, <S%H3190><s%> sin <S%H9128><s%> is crouching <S%H7257><s%> at the door; <S%H6607><s%> and its desire <S%H8669><s%> is for you, but you must master <S%H4910><s%> it."

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> told <S%H559><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%> And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when they were in the field, <S%H7704><s%> that Cain <S%H7014><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H413><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> him.

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> "Where <S%H335><s%> is Abel <S%H1893><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "I do not know. <S%H3045><s%> Am I my brother's keeper <S%H8104><s%>?"
And He said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%>? The voice <S%H6963><s%> of your brother's blood <S%H1818><s%> is crying <S%H6817><s%> to Me from the ground. <S%H127><s%>

"And now <S%H6258><s%> you are cursed <S%H779><s%> from the ground, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has opened <S%H6475><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> your brother's blood <S%H1818><s%> from your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> you cultivate <S%H5647><s%> the ground, <S%H127><s%> it shall no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H3254><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> its strength <S%H3581><s%> to you; you shall be a vagrant <S%H5128><s%> and a wanderer <S%H5110><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
And Cain <S%H7014><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "My punishment <S%H5771><s%> is too <S%H4480><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> to bear! <S%H5375><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> Thou hast driven <S%H1644><s%> me this day <S%H3117><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground; <S%H127><s%> and from Thy face <S%H6440><s%> I shall be hidden, <S%H5641><s%> and I shall be a vagrant <S%H5128><s%> and a wanderer <S%H5110><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it will come <S%H1961><s%> about that whoever <S%H3605><s%> finds <S%H4672><s%> me will kill <S%H2026><s%> me."

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Therefore <S%H3651><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> kills <S%H2026><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> vengeance <S%H5358><s%> will be taken <S%H5358><s%> on him sevenfold. <S%H7659><s%>" And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> for Cain, <S%H7014><s%> lest <S%H1115><s%> anyone <S%H3605><s%> finding <S%H4672><s%> him should slay <S%H5221><s%> him.

Then Cain <S%H7014><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and settled <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Nod, <S%H5113><s%> east <S%H6926><s%> of Eden. <S%H5731><s%>

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> had <S%H3045><s%> relations <S%H3045><s%> with his wife <S%H802><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to Enoch; <S%H2585><s%> and he built <S%H1129><s%> a city, <S%H5892><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> Enoch, <S%H2585><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Now to Enoch <S%H2585><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> Irad; <S%H5897><s%> and Irad <S%H5897><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Mehujael; <S%H4232><s%> and Mehujael <S%H4232><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Methushael; <S%H4967><s%> and Methushael <S%H4967><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Lamech. <S%H3929><s%>

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> to himself two <S%H8147><s%> wives: <S%H802><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Adah, <S%H5711><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other, <S%H8145><s%> Zillah. <S%H6741><s%>
And Adah <S%H5711><s%> gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to Jabal; <S%H2989><s%> he was the father of those who dwell <S%H1><s%> in tents <S%H3427><s%> and [have] livestock. <S%H168><s%>
And his brother's name <S%H8034><s%> was Jubal; <S%H3106><s%> he was the father of all <S%H1><s%> those who play <S%H3605><s%> the lyre <S%H8610><s%> and pipe. <S%H3658><s%>

As for Zillah, <S%H6741><s%> she also <S%H1571><s%> gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to Tubal-cain, the forger <S%H3913><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> implements <S%H9177><s%> of bronze <S%H5178><s%> and iron; <S%H1270><s%> and the sister <S%H269><s%> of Tubal-cain was Naamah. <S%H5279><s%>

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his wives, <S%H802><s%> "Adah <S%H5711><s%> and Zillah, <S%H6741><s%> Listen <S%H8085><s%> to my voice, <S%H6963><s%> You wives <S%H802><s%> of Lamech, <S%H3929><s%> Give <S%H238><s%> heed <S%H238><s%> to my speech, <S%H565><s%> For I have killed <S%H2026><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> for wounding <S%H6482><s%> me; And a boy <S%H3206><s%> for striking <S%H2250><s%> me;
If <S%H3588><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> is avenged <S%H5358><s%> sevenfold, <S%H7659><s%> Then Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seventy-sevenfold."

And Adam <S%H121><s%> had <S%H3045><s%> relations <S%H3045><s%> with his wife <S%H802><s%> again; <S%H5750><s%> and she gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to a son, <S%H1121><s%> and named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Seth, <S%H8352><s%> for, [she said,] "God <S%H430><s%> has appointed <S%H7896><s%> me another <S%H312><s%> offspring <S%H2233><s%> in place <S%H8478><s%> of Abel; <S%H1893><s%> for Cain <S%H7014><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%> him."

And to Seth, <S%H8352><s%> to him also <S%H1571><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> was born; <S%H3205><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Enosh. <S%H583><s%> Then <S%H227><s%> [men] began <S%H2490><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
